0.text: Innate: Master Yi's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Double Strike for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Master Yi's next basic attack on-attack is empowered to consume the stacks to strike twice, the second strike dealing 50% AD physical damage.
0.html: Innate: Master Yi's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Double Strike for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Master Yi's next basic attack on-attack is empowered to consume the stacks to strike twice, the second strike dealing 50% AD physical damage.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: The second strike applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
1.html: The second strike applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
markedPassages: on-hit
critical strike

2.text: If Master Yi's primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.
2.html: If Master Yi's primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.

3.text: The second strike can  critically strike  structures.
3.html: The second strike can critically strike structures.
markedPassages: critically strike
structures
possibleConcerningAbilities: The second strike can  critically strike  structures.

0.text:
Active: Master Yi  vanishes and becomes  unable to act. After 0.231 seconds, he marks the target enemy and then proceeds to mark the nearest  visible un-marked enemy within 600 units, recurring every 0.231 seconds up to 3 times. If there are no other eligible targets before then, Master Yi can mark the same enemies again.
Upon finishing marking, he  reappears 75 units in front of the target and becomes able to act again「 after 0.165 seconds. 」「 1.087 seconds after the start of the cast with 4 bounces. 」During Alpha Strike, Master Yi may choose a direction around the primary target to instead reappear 75 units in that direction. If the primary target  dies or is too far away during the delay, he will reappear at the cast location instead.
0.html:
Active: Master Yi vanishes and becomes unable to act. After 0.231 seconds, he marks the target enemy and then proceeds to mark the nearest visible un-marked enemy within 600 units, recurring every 0.231 seconds up to 3 times. If there are no other eligible targets before then, Master Yi can mark the same enemies again.

Upon finishing marking, he reappears 75 units in front of the target and becomes able to act again「 after 0.165 seconds. 」「 1.087 seconds after the start of the cast with 4 bounces. 」During Alpha Strike, Master Yi may choose a direction around the primary target to instead reappear 75 units in that direction. If the primary target dies or is too far away during the delay, he will reappear at the cast location instead.

1.text: Master Yi then detonates the marks, dealing physical damage and applying  on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness. Subsequent marks on a target instantly deal 25% damage and apply  on-hit effects at 18.75% effectiveness. Alpha Strike deals bonus physical damage to  monsters per hit.
1.html: Master Yi then detonates the marks, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness. Subsequent marks on a target instantly deal 25% damage and apply on-hit effects at 18.75% effectiveness. Alpha Strike deals bonus physical damage to monsters per hit.
markedPassages: on-hit
on-hit
monsters

2.text: Alpha Strike's primary and lesser damage can  critically strike for bonus physical damage equal to (17.5% +  6.125%) AD and (4.375% +  1.53125%) AD respectively.
2.html: Alpha Strike's primary and lesser damage can critically strike for bonus physical damage equal to (17.5% +  6.125%) AD and (4.375% +  1.53125%) AD respectively.

3.text: Basic attacks  on-hit reduce Alpha Strike's  current cooldown by 1 second.
3.html: Basic attacks on-hit reduce Alpha Strike's  current cooldown by 1 second.
markedPassages: on-hit
current cooldown

4.text: Wuju Style and  Highlander can be cast during Alpha Strike. Each time Alpha Strike hits a target, the durations of  Wuju Style and  Highlander are refreshed by their current duration. Alpha Strike does not trigger its cooldown reduction nor grant a stack of  Double Strike when applying on-hit effects.

1.text: While channeling, Master Yi gains 90% damage reduction for the first 0.5 seconds, which is then modified to a reduced amount for the remaining duration of the channel. Meditate's damage reduction is halved against  turrets and lingers for 0.5 seconds after the channel ends.
1.html: While channeling, Master Yi gains 90% damage reduction for the first 0.5 seconds, which is then modified to a reduced amount for the remaining duration of the channel. Meditate's damage reduction is halved against turrets and lingers for 0.5 seconds after the channel ends.

textContent.text: Active: Master Yi empowers his basic attacks within the next 5 seconds to deal  bonus true damage  on-hit.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Master Yi empowers his basic attacks within the next 5 seconds to deal  bonus true damage  on-hit.

textContent.text: Passive: Scoring a champion  takedown reduces the  current cooldowns of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.
textContent.html: Passive: Scoring a champion takedown reduces the  current cooldowns of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.

textContent.text: Active: Master Yi  cleanses himself from all  slows and  cripples. For the next 7 seconds, he gains  ghosting,  bonus attack speed,  bonus movement speed,  slow immunity, and  cripple immunity.
textContent.html: Active: Master Yi cleanses himself from all slows and cripples. For the next 7 seconds, he gains ghosting,  bonus attack speed,  bonus movement speed, slow immunity, and cripple immunity.

textContent.text: While active, scoring a champion  takedown extends Highlander's duration by 7 seconds.

1.concerningText: Master Yi then detonates the marks, dealing physical damage and applying  on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness. Subsequent marks on a target instantly deal 25% damage and apply  on-hit effects at 18.75% effectiveness. Alpha Strike deals bonus physical damage to  monsters per hit.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks ( on-hit / on-attack) grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks ( on-hit /  on-attack) grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  625

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% / 9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 103 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (30 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% /  9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  525

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wrath: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Unique – Seething Strike: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to trigger a Phantom Hit that applies on-hit effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a 0.15 second delay.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – WRATH: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  900

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on  shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
